Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item carries a significant value to me, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own this masterpiece at an offer price of $20000. I believe its unique features and unparalleled craftsmanship justify this investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this special offer. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
